General.Name: Vinedos Emiliana SA
General.Description: Viñedos Emiliana S.A. produces and sells organic and biodynamic wines in Chile. It offers wines under the Gê, 57 Rocas, Antologia, Coyam, Signos de Origen, Vigno, Tais Organic Wine, Amaluna Sparkling Wine, Salvaje, Novas Gran Reserva, and Adobe Reserva brands. The company was formerly known as Bodega y Viñedos Santa Emiliana S.A. and changed its name to Viñedos Emiliana S.A. in May 2004. Viñedos Emiliana S.A. was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
General.Address: WTC Building, Santiago de Chile, Chile
